title: A Talented Designer
content:
The designer I chose to show is David Carson. I thing that his designs are eye-catching. His unique style is what I like most about his designs. I have provided a link to David Carson's site so that you can see his gallery. I am sure you will be impressed.

[davidcarsondesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019151054/http:/davidcarsondesign.com/)
author: achristophe
